mapper.select: select distinct * from (select a.id,a.Title,a.keyWord,a.Des,a.fSize,e.MType,e.id typeId,a.DLoadTimes,a.ClickTimes,a.fromflag,a.Fname,a.Fpath, (select COUNT(tt.id) from z_assetevaluate tt where tt.assetId = a.id and tt.flag = 0 and tt.IsScore = 0 and tt.aType = #{fromFlag})userNum, (select ascore from z_assetevaluate ttt where ttt.assetId = a.id and ttt.flag = 0 and ttt.IsScore = 0 and ttt.UserId = #{userId} and ttt.aType = #{fromFlag}) score, (select case when COUNT(t.assetId) = 0 then 0 else (sum(t.Ascore) / COUNT(t.assetId)) end avgScore from z_assetevaluate t where t.assetId = a.id and t.flag = 0 and t.IsScore = 0 and t.aType = #{fromFlag}) avgScore, a.isLocal,REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(a.Fname),LOCATE('.',REVERSE(a.Fname)))) as FileExt,a.isDWJ from z_districts_resource a left join z_districts_resnav b on a.ResCode=b.ResCode left join j_syscourse c on c.tfcode = b.StructCode left join x_resourcetype e on a.MType = e.id where a.id =#{resId} and b.flag=0 and c.flag=0 and a.fromflag = #{fromFlag} and a.flag=0 ) a limit 1

select StructCode from z_districts_resnav nav LEFT JOIN z_districts_resource res on nav.ResCode = res.ResCode LEFT JOIN j_syscourse sys on sys.tfcode = StructCode where res.id = #{resId} and nav.flag = false and res.flag = false and sys.flag = false
AND EXISTS ( SELECT TFcode FROM j_producttfcodecontrast ps WHERE ps.proCode = 'zy' AND ps.tfcode = LEFT(nav.StructCode,10) ) ORDER BY LOCATE(#{curTfcode},StructCode) desc
mapper.update: update z_districts_resource set ClickTimes = ClickTimes+1 where rescode =#{rescode}
update z_districts_resource set DLoadTimes = DLoadTimes+1 where rescode =#{rescode}
mapper.select: select * from z_districts_resource where AuthorId = #{userId} and CreateDT = #{time}
SELECT max(id) as id FROM `z_districts_resource` where assetid = #{assetId}
